fields.title: Harris 1980 ABC News Economy and Presidential Elections Survey, study no. 802115

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
Survey investigates voter attitudes toward the economy and the elections.

Other topics include Cuban refugees, energy, tax cuts, toxic chemical wastes at Love Canal, and the shooting of Vernon Jordan.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Harris obtained a cross-section sample of likely voters. Attitudes on various topics were collected by questionnaire in a telephone interview; U.S. adults, likely voters; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-802115;

distributor.distributorName: Louis Harris Data Center, University of North Carolina
